description:
Demolition and clearance of existing buildings and erection of a 25 storey building (78m high) to provide flexible Use Classes A1/A2/A3/A4/A5/B1/D1/D2 floorspace at ground floor level, student amenity area or flexible Use Classes A3/A4/D2 at 23rd level, student amenity space at 24th level with 450 student bedrooms (arranged in 88x5 bed flats and 10 studios) on upper floors.  Refurbishment of the railway arches and the existing 3 storey building fronting onto Holloway Road with associated change of use to flexible Use Classes A1/A2/A3/A4/A5/B1/D1/D2 floorspace.  In addition, new pedestrian route from Holloway Road to Hornsey Road with associated landscaping and public realm improvements, provision of 3 disabled car parking bays, scooter and cycle parking, and servicing off Hornsey Road.
This application may affect the character and appearance of a conservation area and the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Section 67 and 73.
site_name: Land And Railway Arches Rear Of 45
